Class SongNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • SongNode

  • public class SongNode
extends java.lang.Object
    The SongNode class is a node wrapper class for the Song object, it will essentially make up one node of a doubly linked list that overall represent a play list. Therefore the data that one of the SongNode is storing will be a Song object, and it will contain the references to the previous node and the next node in the doubly linked list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SongNode()
      Default constructor of the SongNode class, it will just created a SongNode object with all of the variables, including the references to the previous node, the references to the next node, and the Song it contains to null.
      SongNode(Song givenSong)
      Parameterized constructor of the SongNode class, it will constructor a SongNode object with a specified Song to be stored inside the SongNode.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SongNode getNext()
      Returns the SongNode references to the next SongNode relative to the current SongNode
      SongNode getPrev()
      Returns the SongNode references to the previous SongNode relative to the current SongNode
      Song getSong()
      Returns the Song that is stored within the SongNode
      void setData(Song givenSong)
      The mutator method for the references to the Song that the SongNode is holding
      void setNext(SongNode givenNode)
      The mutator method for the references to the next SongNode of this SongNode
      void setPrev(SongNode givenNode)
      The mutator method for the references to previous SongNode of this SongNode

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SongNode

        public SongNode()
        Default constructor of the SongNode class, it will just created a SongNode object with all of the variables, including the references to the previous node, the references to the next node, and the Song it contains to null. Later on the user can change the information for each variables using the mutator methods

      • SongNode

        public SongNode(Song givenSong)
        Parameterized constructor of the SongNode class, it will constructor a SongNode object with a specified Song to be stored inside the SongNode. The references to the previous and next node still remains null
        Parameters:
        givenSong - The specific Song object to be stored inside of the SongNode

    • Method Detail

      • getSong

        public Song getSong()
        Returns the Song that is stored within the SongNode
        Returns:
        Returns the Song object that is stored in the SongNode object

      • getNext

        public SongNode getNext()
        Returns the SongNode references to the next SongNode relative to the current SongNode
        Returns:
        Returns the next SongNode references relative to this SongNode

      • getPrev

        public SongNode getPrev()
        Returns the SongNode references to the previous SongNode relative to the current SongNode
        Returns:
        Returns the previous SongNode references relative to this SongNode

      • setNext

        public void setNext(SongNode givenNode)
        The mutator method for the references to the next SongNode of this SongNode

        Postcondition: The references to the next SongNode of this SongNode is set to givenNode

        Parameters:
        givenNode - The SongNode to set the Song's next SongNode to

      • setPrev

        public void setPrev(SongNode givenNode)
        The mutator method for the references to previous SongNode of this SongNode

        Postcondition: The references to the previous SongNode of this SongNode is set tot givenNode

        Parameters:
        givenNode - The SongNode to set the Song's prev SongNode to

      • setData

        public void setData(Song givenSong)
        The mutator method for the references to the Song that the SongNode is holding

        Postcondition: The Song that this SongNode contains is set to the given Song object

        Parameters:
        givenSong - The Song to set the Song that the SongNode contains to
